metadata.description: Unique id for the scheduled alert rule

properties.description: This Creates an incident when a host has a high number of Urgent, severity 5, vulnerabilities detected.
properties.displayName: High Number of Urgent Vulnerabilities Detected
properties.query:
let threshold = 10;
QualysHostDetection_CL
| mv-expand todynamic(Detections_s)
| where Detections_s.Severity == "5"
| summarize StartTime = min(TimeGenerated), EndTime = max(TimeGenerated), count() by NetBios_s, IPAddress
| where count_ >= threshold
| extend timestamp = StartTime, HostCustomEntity = NetBios_s, IPCustomEntity = IPAddress
